book.synopsis: In the year 665, Sister Fidelma fears for the lives of the little children around her when the impetuous ruler of an Irish fiefdom vows to avenge the murder of a beloved religious scholar, when the body of the Venerable Daca+a7n is found in the Abbey of Ros Ailithir. Original.
